column4: Tesla CEO Musk's upbeat tweets about China boost stock

column4: European stocks bounce back  helped by techs
column5: PARIS  March 30 European stocks rose early on Monday  bouncing back from last week's losses with tech shares rallying after news of merger talks in the sector spurred a late-session rally on Wall Street on Friday.

column4: Europe Factors to Watch-Shares set to rise; techs in focus
column5: PARIS  March 30 European stocks were set to rise on Monday  bouncing back from last week's losses with tech shares in focus after news of merger talks in the sector spurred a late-session rally on Wall Street on Friday.
